name: The Succubi Trap
description: Can you face the curse of the succubus? The Succubi Trap is a hack-n-slash drain-to-trail, race to the finish maze game.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 32-bit Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 HD series card or higher DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 2 GB available space Additional Notes: Headphones
